summary: This is my first published mod. It adds an almost unique War Axe into the game, which you have to craft at the Skyforge. It is a recolor of the Steel War Axe with a single symbol on it.
descriptionHtml:
I have already made smaller mods, but just for fun or for sharing with my friends. This is the first one that I actually decided to publish.
As there are lots of useful unique weaponry: swords (Dawnbreaker), greatswords (Ebony Blade), daggers (Mehrunes\' Razor), maces (Mace of Molag Bal), warhammers (Volendrung) and battleaxes (Rueful Axe)... why the hell no decent War Axe? \'-\'
For all you battlemages, axe-wielding spellswords and axe dual-wielders, I made a War Axe comparable to a Daedric Artifact!
To craft it, get the \'Dwarven Smithing\' OR \'Advanced Armors\' perk and go to the Skyforge. It will be in the \"Misc\" session.

Its stats are as follows:
15 base damage (same as Ebony/Daedric War Axes)
18 weight (same as a Daedric War Axe)
15 base Fire Damage enchantment
10 base Absorb Health enchantment

Its crafting recipe is as follows:
1x Steel War Axe
2x Steel Ingot
4x Gold Ingot
3x Leather Strips
1x Daedra Heart
5x Firesalts
1x Black Soul Gem (Black)

It also requires 2 Gold Ingots to upgrade at a Grindstone. It\'s recipe is large and hard to fill exactly because it is supposed to be as powerful as a Daedric Artifact such as the Mace of Molag Bal.
If I offended someone with the name \"Agni\" (for religious purposes), it was not intentional. Should you find it better, I can change the name. This name was chosen as Agni is for me the best representant of fire (AND \'fire\' in Sanskrit).
Say what you think of it in the comments, thanks =)
author: XenorrK
